QuestData.Title: The Fate of Kagrosh
QuestData.Description: The scouting party originally had three members. Unfortunately, Kagrosh decided he wanted to be a hero.$B$BHe descended into the Deathforge and we haven't heard from him since.$B$BIn all likelihood, the fool's gone and gotten himself killed. The Shadow Council members aren't idiots and Kagrosh wasn't exactly strong in the subtlety department, if you know what I mean. Keep an eye out for him in the Deathforge and recover any information or items he might have collected.
QuestData.LogDescription: Scout Zagran at Slag Watch wants you to search the Deathforge for Kagrosh and recover Kagrosh's Pack.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you find any sign of Kagrosh in the Deathforge?
QuestData.RewardText: <Zagran shakes his head as he accepts the pack from you>$B$BI told you he was a fool. I hope there's something in here that justifies the time you spent searching for him.
